name: MemoryMatch
0:
”Alexa open Memory Match”
”Alexa play Memory Match”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: memory match
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

In this game you need to remember the sequences of words and recall them. Choose from 3 categories: Colours, Food or Animals. Listen to the instructions and see how many you can memorize in a row!

It will start simply by having to rename the words one by one. But then it will get harder and harder as you have to memorize specific words within the sequence!

Good Luck
 If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
